sys_remote_update_set.description: Merging US Return Object from Script Action with US ITSM Core Module Implementation 1. Create a script action that returns an array of objects. Call the array "incidents". Each object is "incident". The object "incident", which is a javascript data structure, has two properties. "incidentNumber" which is the latest incident in the group of incidents which qualify for problem creation and "relatedIncidents" which is the count of related incidents of the problem created in the flow (2 below). 2. Create a scheduled flow which creates a problem for a selected incident based on the following criteria: • Trigger: When >5 incidents created on same CI in the last 24 hours or have the same Category and SubCategory •Action: Auto-create Problem. 3. Create a catalog item to request Software Installation Added the following Flow: Scheduled Flow to Create Problem for recurring Incident (Not active) Script Action: Script Action to Read Incidents for creating Problem
sys_remote_update_set.name: US ITSM Core Module Implementation V2

Action 1: Check if the selected CI has install status ‘Installed’, Operational Status is ‘Operational’ and Warranty expiration is empty or greater than todays date
o	If yes: Continue processing.
o	If not: Notify IT team or create a task for CMDB reconciliation.
Action 2: Auto-create Request Task for software installation.
Action 3: Request approval from software admin.
Action 4: Notify the requester once the task is assigned / completed.</description><display_name_after_preview/><flow_priority>MEDIUM</flow_priority><generation_source/><internal_name>autoprocess_software_installation_requests</internal_name><label_cache>[{"name":"Service ('CI:' + ci) : ('CAT:' + cat + '|' + subcat); // Fetch the latest incident in this group var latest = new GlideRecord('incident'); latest.addQuery('sys_created_on', '>', 'javascript:gs.endOfYesterday()'); if (ci) { latest.addQuery('cmdb_ci', ci); } else { latest.addQuery('category', cat); latest.addQuery('subcategory', subcat); } latest.orderByDesc('sys_created_on'); latest.setLimit(1); latest.query(); if (latest.hasNext()) { latest.next(); incidents.push( latest.number.toString() ); } } } // Set outputs for downstream Flow steps //outputs.incidents = JSON.stringify(incidents); outputs.incidents = incidents; })(inputs, outputs); 71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719bsys_hub_step_instance52b950bc8363a2107ffb1630ceaad349400sys_variable_valueadmin2025-08-21 ('CI:' + ci) : ('CAT:' + cat + '|' + subcat); // Fetch the latest incident in this group var latest = new GlideRecord('incident'); latest.addQuery('sys_created_on', '>', 'javascript:gs.endOfYesterday()'); if (ci) { latest.addQuery('cmdb_ci', ci); } else { latest.addQuery('category', cat); latest.addQuery('subcategory', subcat); } latest.orderByDesc('sys_created_on'); latest.setLimit(1); latest.query(); if (latest.hasNext()) { latest.next(); incidents.push( latest.number.toString() ); } } } // Set outputs for downstream Flow steps //outputs.incidents = JSON.stringify(incidents); outputs.incidents = incidents; })(inputs, outputs); 71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719bsys_hub_step_instancea9f9d4bc8363a2107ffb1630ceaad35e400sys_variable_valueadmin2025-08-21 11:29:241d443f9d832b62107ffb1630ceaad3511admin2025-08-23 11:55:41(function execute(inputs, outputs) { var gaIncident = new GlideAggregate('incident'); gaIncident.addEncodedQuery('sys_created_onONToday@javascript:gs.beginningOfToday()@javascript:gs.endOfToday()'); gaIncident.addAggregate('COUNT'); gaIncident.groupBy('category'); gaIncident.groupBy('subcategory'); gaIncident.groupBy('cmdb_ci'); gaIncident.query(); var incidentGroups = []; // holds results per group while (gaIncident.next()) { var incidentCount = parseInt(gaIncident.getAggregate('COUNT'), 10); if (incidentCount >= 5) { var ci = gaIncident.cmdb_ci.toString(); var category = gaIncident.category.toString(); var subcategory = gaIncident.subcategory.toString(); var groupResult = { relatedIncidentCount: incidentCount, latestIncidentNumber: null, allIncidentNumbers: [] }; // --- Single query: get all incidents in this group --- var grIncident = new GlideRecord('incident'); grIncident.addQuery('sys_created_on', '>=', gs.beginningOfToday()); if (ci) { grIncident.addQuery('cmdb_ci', ci); } else { grIncident.addQuery('category', category); grIncident.addQuery('subcategory', subcategory); } grIncident.orderByDesc('sys_created_on'); // latest comes first grIncident.query(); var isFirst = true; while (grIncident.next()) { var number = grIncident.number.toString(); // first record = latest if (isFirst) { groupResult.latestIncidentNumber = number; isFirst = false; } groupResult.allIncidentNumbers.push(number); } incidentGroups.push(groupResult); } } outputs.incidents = incidentGroups; })(inputs, outputs); var gaIncident = new GlideAggregate('incident'); gaIncident.addEncodedQuery('sys_created_onONToday@javascript:gs.beginningOfToday()@javascript:gs.endOfToday()'); gaIncident.addAggregate('COUNT'); gaIncident.groupBy('category'); gaIncident.groupBy('subcategory'); gaIncident.groupBy('cmdb_ci'); gaIncident.query(); var incidentGroups = []; // holds results per group while (gaIncident.next()) { var incidentCount = parseInt(gaIncident.getAggregate('COUNT'), 10); if (incidentCount >= 5) { var ci = gaIncident.cmdb_ci.toString(); var category = gaIncident.category.toString(); var subcategory = gaIncident.subcategory.toString(); var groupResult = { relatedIncidentCount: incidentCount, latestIncidentNumber: null, allIncidentNumbers: [] }; // --- Single query: get all incidents in this group --- var grIncident = new GlideRecord('incident'); grIncident.addQuery('sys_created_on', '>=', gs.beginningOfToday()); if (ci) { grIncident.addQuery('cmdb_ci', ci); } else { grIncident.addQuery('category', category); grIncident.addQuery('subcategory', subcategory); } grIncident.orderByDesc('sys_created_on'); // latest comes first grIncident.query(); var isFirst = true; while (grIncident.next()) { var number = grIncident.number.toString(); // first record = latest if (isFirst) { groupResult.latestIncidentNumber = number; isFirst = false; } groupResult.allIncidentNumbers.push(number); } incidentGroups.push(groupResult); } } outputs.incidents = incidentGroups; })(inputs, outputs);
